TopicTitle: How does one report posts on the new forum?

Articles.Content:
How do you report posts now in the new forum? In the vBulletin forum, it was just as simple as clicking on the traingle witht eh exclamation mark. Is there something similar here?

 

EDIT: NEVERMIND. Right next to the date. Mods please lock.

Edited December 2, 2015 by bigyihsuan
